author: vmassol
msg: - Funnily I made the same change than Chris, at the same moment, but I was in a train and couldn't commit! We both externalized book.xml information in build.xml. I merged both of our changes

author: cmlenz
msg: properties from book.xml to build.xml, and pass them to the stylesheet
as parameters. Motivation: keep as close to the "standard" (hehe) DTD
